mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room( name, capacity, active_status, open_time, close_time, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES( #{name}, #{capacity}, #{activeStatus}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room WHERE room_id = #{id} AND active_status='ACTIVE'
